paragraph.paragraph:
WEL_APPLICATION contains a feature init_application which does nothing by default, but is called before the application is started. This can be redefined to execute tasks that must be performed before the application is running. A common redefinition is to allow the loading of common dll's, see
/libraries/wel/samples/list_view/index.html list_view sample for a demonstration of this technique.
